Earth													Mars
thing = {}														
														thing = {}
														
														
														thing.a = 'hello'

thing.z = 'cool'


														----> thing
														----> thing.z = 'cool'
														thing = {a: 'hello', z: 'cool'}
thing = {z: 'cool'} <----
thing.a = 'hello' <----
thing = {a: 'hello', z: 'cool'}

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Earth															Mars
thing = 5														thing = 5

thing = {a: 'yay'}

																thing = {b: 'cool'}
																
																
																22 -> thing = {a: 'yay', b: 'cool'}

thing = {a: 'yay', b:'cool'} <- 24
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Earth															Mars
thing = 5														thing = 5

thing = {a: 'yay'}

																thing = {b: 'cool'}
thing = 9
thing = {z: 1}															
thing.j = 'how?'

																thing.k = 'lol'
thing = {z: 1, j: 'how?'} <- 36
thing = {z: 1, j: 'how?', k: 'lol'} <- 41								// wrong! need to send thing when also

																thing.c = 20
																34 -> thing = {a: 'yay', b: 'cool'}
																38 -> thing = 9
																39 -> thing = {z:1}
																40 -> thing = {j: 'how?', z: 1}
thing = {z: 1, j: 'how?'} <- 45
